sources.title: This Is My Affair (1937)
sources.description: President McKinley asks Lt. Richard L. Perry to go underground to identify some obviously very well briefed Mid-Western bank robbers based in Saint Paul, Minnesota. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/this-is-my-affair-1937/

metadata.Plot: Navy Lt. Richard Perry becomes an undercover man out to discover the leaders of a group of well connected men who pull off bank robberies during the McKinley administration (early 20th century).
metadata.Writer: Allen Rivkin, Lamar Trotti, Kubec Glasmon
metadata.Actors: Robert Taylor, Barbara Stanwyck, Victor McLaglen
